description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6jmrn","text":"Protocol for cell electroporation with the NEON transfection system","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a2glf","text":"Warm the resuspension buffer and the E2 buffer in the water bath out of the water at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"buee1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"12908040168711EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"kaa5","text":"Put the electrode part inside the left hand side hood in 419","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e9bt1","text":"Put a NEON glass tube matching the electrode position\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftorc","text":"Add   of E2 buffer in the glass tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dbv8i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"39t4m","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dh0a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"450D2730168711EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"18sci","text":"The buffer should cover the electrode level","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"jmbd","text":"Switch on the NEON equipment\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h3de","text":"Load the saved settings. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"529ma","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7e7ah","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82n75","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"lpkf","text":"The settings depend on the cells used. I.e., we used 3 pulses of 10 ms at 1650 mV for C2C12 myoblasts","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a7eu","text":"Add     of the plasmid in a sterile Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"BC980720168711EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bn06g","text":"Add   of fresh cell media without antibiotics in a T25 flask\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f22f2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"CE8D5930168711EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dcdh1","text":"Trypsinise the cells as usual","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eoknq","text":"Once you have the cell pellet, discard the supernatant carefully","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a515","text":"Wash the pellet with   of sterile DPBS and discard the supernatant carefully","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"FB6CED80168711EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fv14g","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet with   of resuspension buffer and discard the buffer\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"281m3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"130","error":false,"guid":"2ED8AF60168811EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ch9v2","text":"Wash the cell pellet with   of resuspension buffer and discard the supernatant carefully","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"3E7B288F168811EEAE420A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cj0d1","text":"Transfer    of the cell solution to the Eppendorf tube containing the plasmid\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7mab2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"130","error":false,"guid":"55DEEB60168811EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3fg7","text":"Mix without making any bubble","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c3a8","text":"Take   of the mixture with the NEON pipette and place it in the glass tube matching the electrode position\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"59gbn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"7844C440168811EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a8bt7","text":"Press \"START\" in the NEON display","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctdla","text":"Once the \"COMPLETE\" message appears in the NEON display, put the cells with the NEON pipette in the T25 flask\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54jd4","text":"Put the T25 flask in the “Antibiotics free” incubator\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75uii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28tna","text":"After  , check the cells under the microscope and perform the required experiment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fna24","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"E04314C0168811EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jsf4","text":"Take a   tip with the NEON pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9lk99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"456C56D0168A11EEB5C195A8C3729A28","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
